Building Trust in Waste

Why Anenta?

Acting as your management partner, we provide simple and effective waste solutions.

Regardless of your industry or size we have a solution that will fit your requirements.

Take a look at our range of professional and affordable services, which include general, recycling, saniwaste, confidential and clinical waste streams.

Select from one of the following:

  • Made to Measure

  • Large single or multiple sites

  • For organisations who have specific or unique requirements.

    You can choose from a number of services, including: assessment, specification and procurement.

    Let us lead you through a process that will give you the perfect waste management solution. From assessment to specification and procurement then on to implementation and operation management - our experienced team can handle all your needs.

  • Find out more

  • Public Sector

  • NHS, CCG, Local Authorities

  • Offering an end-to-end waste management service and working with your existing contracts or specifying and procuring them from scratch - we deliver value for money.

    Our online operational waste management platform drives the efficiencies, service quality and accountability that the public sector requires.

  • Find out more
